articles.title: ‘King Kohli’ scores 186 to end three-year Test century drought - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: India’s Virat Kohli ended a three-year wait for his 28th century by scoring 186 in the fourth Test against Australia.
articles.content:
Indian cricketer Virat Kohli has ended a three-year wait for a century by scoring 186 runs in Indias first innings in their fourth Test match against Australia.
